items.sentence: Tom served three years in prison for a crime he didn\'t commit.
Tom always drinks at least three cups of coffee in the morning.
Tom always gives the same old excuse for being late for school.
Tom and Mary accomplished their mission without any difficulty.
Tom asked Mary for some money so he could buy something to eat.
It seems like we haven\'t done anything fun since last October.
Tom called his wife and told her that he\'d be late for dinner.
Tom is the kind of person who always has to have the last word.
Tom is the only one in our family who regularly attends church.
Can you remember the first time you tried playing the clarinet?
Did you know that Tom and Mary both have houses on Park Street?
Did you like your teachers when you were in junior high school?
When I had five hens, on the average I\'d get three eggs a day.
I like his new house, but I had not expected it to be so small.
I need to borrow some money so I can buy some medicine for Tom.
I have a lot of old books. A couple of them are quite valuable.
Tom made it clear that he didn\'t want to go to Boston with us.
Tom can\'t be in the car more than ten minutes or he gets sick.
I think it\'s pretty obvious that Tom doesn\'t want to do that.
Last night, I ate some asparagus and ham at my friend\'s house.
I drove all the way to Boston just to give Tom a birthday gift.
I could tell you some things about Tom that might surprise you.
Tom can\'t say for sure how many times Mary has been to Boston.
Tom didn\'t know who Mary wanted to give the bottle of wine to.
Tom didn\'t leave a suicide note, so the police suspect murder.
I have to leave early today because I have to attend a funeral.
We all took for granted that the professor could speak English.
We have to use the stairs because the elevator is out of order.
We need another three million dollars to complete this project.
What textbook does Tom use when he teaches French to beginners?
When I have homework to do, my brother always helps me with it.
Tom pretended like he didn\'t know what Mary was talking about.
Tom hates to admit that he\'s a member of the older generation.
Tom couldn\'t shake the feeling that there was something wrong.
Tom did it this morning so he wouldn\'t have to do it tomorrow.
Tom didn\'t ask Mary who she was planning to go to Boston with.
Tom didn\'t feel like sitting for two hours in a movie theater.
Tom didn\'t find out he had been adopted until he was thirteen.
I can\'t help feeling that Tom hasn\'t told me the whole truth.
You aren\'t the only one who likes baseball. Tom likes it, too.
Mary was lonely because the other students didn\'t talk to her.
Tom was stabbed with a kitchen knife, but he\'s going to be OK.
Tom wasn\'t able to get everything done that needed to be done.
Tom and Mary haven\'t yet told anyone they plan to get married.
Tom and Mary hugged each other and kissed each other\'s cheeks.
Tom and Mary know each other, but they\'re not exactly friends.
Tom was badly in debt for a while, but he\'s on his feet again.
What\'s the best way to tell someone that you don\'t like them?
I know it\'s going to be unpleasant to talk about the accident.
I made Tom promise that he wouldn\'t tell anyone what happened.
